function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Resistance to authority and measures","Impact":"Disobedience of measures, increased risk of contagion spread","Mitigation":"Build trust in authorities, provide clear communication, involve community in decision-making","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, communication tools, data transparency tools","People":"General public, communities at risk","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Political orientation not a predictor of compliance","Impact":"Difficulty in targeting and tailoring communication and interventions","Mitigation":"Use alternative predictors for targeted communication and interventions, conduct further research into predictors of compliance","Technologies":"Predictive analytics, research methodologies, targeted communication tools","People":"Public health researchers, communication specialists","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"}]}
